lead_paragraph: Once derided as the tinkerman while in charge of Chelsea, Claudio Ranieri's secret for Leicester City's Premier League title charge this season is astonishingly straightforward -- a settled team that virtually picks itself.

headline.print_headline: Leicester's Title Surge Built on Simple Foundations
headline.main: Leicester's Title Surge Built on Simple Foundations
